mapper.sql: id, apply_number, case_record_id, case_summary, apply_summary, invite_summary, apply_user_id, apply_hospital_id, invite_user_id, invite_hospital_id,invite_branch_id, apply_branch_id, consultant_apply_time, apply_status, apply_type, apply_remark,refuse_remark,apply_urgent, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_time, delete_user, del_flag

ayf.id ayfId,ayf.apply_number ayfapplyNumber,ayf.case_record_id ayfcaseRecordId,ayf.case_summary ayfcaseSummary, ayf.apply_summary ayfapplySummary,ayf.invite_summary ayfinviteSummary,ayf.apply_user_id ayfapplyUserId, ayf.apply_hospital_id ayfapplyHospitalId,ayf.apply_branch_id ayfapplyBranchId,ayf.invite_user_id ayfinviteUserId, ayf.invite_hospital_id ayfinviteHospitalId,ayf.invite_branch_id ayfinviteBranchId, ayf.consultant_apply_time ayfconsultantApplyTime,ayf.apply_status ayfapplyStatus,ayf.apply_type ayfapplyType, ayf.apply_remark atyapplyRemark,ayf.refuse_remark atyrefuseRemark,ayf.apply_urgent ayfapplyUrgent, ayt.event_start_time ayteventStartTime,ayt.event_end_time ayteventEndTime, cr.patient_age crpatientAge,cr.patient_sex crpatientSex,cr.patient_height crpatientHeight, cr.patient_weight crpatientWeight,cr.case_diagnosis crcaseDiagnosis, cp.id cpId, cp.detail_address cpdetailAddress, cp.patient_name cppatientName, cp.patient_card cppatientCard, cp.patient_phone cppatientPhone, cc.content_type_id cccontentTypeId,cc.content_path cccontentPath,cc.order_weight ccorderWeight, cc.content_remark cccontentRemark,cc.id ccid, cct.consultant_start_time cctconsultantStartTime,cct.consultant_end_time cctconsultantEndTime, cct.consultant_report cctconsultantReport,cct.consultant_feedback cctconsultantFeedback, cct.consultant_price cctconsultantPrice,cct.hospital_price ccthospitalPrice, cct.consultant_user_list consultantUserList, an.id applyNodeId, an.node_name applyNodeName, an.node_time applyNodeTime, an.node_operator applyNodeOperator
mapper.select:
select
from apply_form ayf left join case_record cr on cr.id = ayf.case_record_id left join case_patient cp on cp.id = cr.patient_id left join case_consultant cct on cct.id = ayf.id left join apply_time ayt on ayt.apply_form_id = ayf.id AND ayt.del_flag = "0" left join case_content cc on cc.record_id = cr.id AND cc.del_flag = "0" left join apply_node an on an.apply_id = ayf.id where ayf.id = #{id} and ayf.del_flag= "0" order by cc.order_weight,an.node_time,ayt.event_start_time
mapper.insert: insert into apply_form (id, apply_number, case_record_id, case_summary, apply_summary, invite_summary, apply_user_id, apply_hospital_id, invite_user_id, invite_hospital_id,invite_branch_id, apply_branch_id, consultant_apply_time, apply_status, apply_type, apply_remark,refuse_remark, applyUrgent, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_time, delete_user, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applySummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultantApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual

mapper.update:
update apply_form
apply_number = #{applyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_record_id = #{caseRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_summary = #{caseSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_summary = #{applySummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_summary = #{inviteSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_user_id = #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_hospital_id = #{inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invite_branch_id = #{inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_branch_id = #{applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consultant_apply_time = #{consultantApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_remark = #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refuse_remark = #{refuseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_urgent = #{applyUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_user = #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update apply_form set apply_number = #{applyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_record_id = #{caseRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_summary = #{caseSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_summary = #{applySummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_summary = #{inviteSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_user_id = #{inviteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_hospital_id = #{inviteHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite_branch_id = #{inviteBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_branch_id = #{applyBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consultant_apply_time = #{consultantApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_remark = #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refuse_remark = #{refuseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_urgent = #{applyUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_user = #{deleteUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_CREATE_SUCCESS" and invite_user_id != #{applyUserId} or NULL) cacs, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_ACCEDE" or NULL) caa, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_REJECT" or NULL) car, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_SLAVE_ACCEDE" and apply_user_id != #{applyUserId} or NULL) csa, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_SLAVE_REJECT" or NULL) csr, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_MASTER_ACCEDE" or NULL) cma, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_MASTER_REJECT" or NULL) cmr, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_DATETIME_LOCKED" or NULL) cdrl, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_END" or NULL) crs from apply_form
del_flag = "0"
AND apply_type IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (apply_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or invite_user_id = #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_CREATE_SUCCESS" and invite_hospital_id != #{applyHospitalId} or NULL) cacs, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_ACCEDE" or NULL) caa, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_APPLY_REJECT" or NULL) car, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_SLAVE_ACCEDE" and apply_hospital_id != #{applyHospitalId} or NULL) csa, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_SLAVE_REJECT" or NULL) csr, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_MASTER_ACCEDE" or NULL) cma, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_MASTER_REJECT" or NULL) cmr, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_DATETIME_LOCKED" or NULL) cdrl, count(apply_status="INQUIRY_END" or NULL) crs from apply_form
del_flag = "0"
AND apply_type IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (apply_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or invite_hospital_id = #{applyHospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select count(id) from apply_form where del_flag = "0" and apply_user_id = #{applyUserId} and apply_type = #{applyType}
mapper.sql: ayf.id ayfId,ayf.apply_summary ayfapplySummary,ayf.invite_summary ayfinviteSummary, ayf.consultant_apply_time ayfconsultantApplyTime,ayf.apply_type ayfapplyType, ayf.apply_urgent ayfapplyUrgent,ayf.apply_number ayfapplyNumber,ayf.case_summary ayfcaseSummary
